title: How to View Your Calendar in Gmail

steps.title: Open Gmail in a web browser.
steps.content: Open Gmail in a web browser. If you aren’t signed in to your account, follow the on-screen instructions to sign in now.

steps.title: Click the calendar icon.
steps.content: Click the calendar icon. It's at the top of the vertical icon bar running along the right of your inbox. Look for a a blue calendar icon that says ″31″ inside. This displays the ″Today″ view of your Google Calendar.

steps.title: Switch to a different date.
steps.content: Switch to a different date. To see a different day's schedule, click the date above the calendar, then select a date. You can also use the arrows next to ″Today″ to move forward or backward one day at a time.

steps.title: Switch to schedule view.
steps.content: Switch to schedule view. To see all upcoming events instead of today's, click ⁝ above the calendar, then click Schedule .

steps.title: Click the pop-out icon to open the full calendar.
steps.content: Click the pop-out icon to open the full calendar. It's the square with an arrow inside at the top-right corner of the calendar bar. Your full calendar will open in a new browser tab.
